summary: Enhanced /lake command with automatic task creation for unfixable build errors. Added STEP 5 to lake.md with error grouping, user confirmation, and task/artifact creation. Added Step 13 to SKILL.md with detailed implementation guidance. Added error report format to artifact-formats.md.

artifacts.summary: Added STEP 5 for task creation workflow with substeps 5A-5C
Added Step 13 with detailed task creation implementation (13A-13F)
Added Error Reports section documenting error-report-{DATE}.md format

completion_data.completion_summary: Implemented automatic task creation for unfixable build errors in /lake command. Added STEP 5 to lake.md, Step 13 to SKILL.md with detailed jq patterns and TODO.md update instructions, and documented error report artifact format.

next_steps: Review implementation and test with actual build errors
